summary: PICKED UP CAR AT HOLBERTS AUDI IN WARRINGTON, PA ON JUNE 15, 2004. DEALER REPLACED RIGHT FRON UPPER AND LOWER SUSPENSION LINKS. AFTER LEAVING THE DEALERSHIP, THE ABS LIGHT CAME ON AND THE BRAKE LIGHT BEGAN BLINKING. BROUGHT CAR BACK TO DEALER AND DEALER SAID ABS CONTROL MODULE NEEDS REPLACING. WITHOUT A FUNCTIONING ABS CONTROL MODULE, THE CAR IS WITHOUT THE INCREASED SAFETY PROVIDED BY ANTI LOCK BRAKES. HAVEN'T REPLACED THE PART YET DUE TO ITS $1,000 PRICE TAG.*AK
